column4: hey, anyone know a good place for a nube to get irc command information?
thanks
I should have thought of that one.
thanks for not trolling me.
which irc client
which irc client?
for xchat it is /join #freenode   or simply /j #freenode
you still there
to highlight others in such a busy channel, type the first three or so letters, then hit the tab key and you complete their nickname
thanks!
so for me would be baz <tab> key and it would highlight me
that rules! awesome tip.
there is weechat and irssi if you want to use command line clients
gnome enabled is fine... =O)
additionally there is channel #xchat and they have quite good documentation on their site
thanks for holding my hand. I'm going to add xchat to my fav's.
to get autojoin on channels, click xchat network list then highlight ubuntu servers and hit edit and add the channels #channel,#channel,#etc to autojoin
awesome
for instance if you get a cloak via #freenode
you've been doing this for a while. I can tell.
not very long in truth. not much to know to be honest (just a few commands)
Thanks for taking the time.
it's why we are here :)
true
